Package controller

Class AddProductController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddProductController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller class for the add product screen.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      This is the initialize method. It sets up the parts and associated parts table to be able to display the necessary data.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • onActionSaveProduct

      public void onActionSaveProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      This method saves the information entered into the textfields as a new product and then returns to the main screen. It also validates the data and generates error messages.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • searchParts

      public void searchParts()
      This method searches all the parts to find a match to search input. It then sets the matches it found to be displayed in the tableview.

    • removeAssociatedPart

      public void removeAssociatedPart()
      This method removes a part from the associated parts list for the product. It also generates a window asking you to confirm the removal.

    • cancelAction

      public void cancelAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      This method cancels the action of creating a new part by returning to the main screen
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
